name: @deriv-bot/ctrader-client
description: cTrader Open API client for depth of market and tick data

scripts.download-protos: curl -o src/proto/OpenApiCommonMessages.proto https://raw.githubusercontent.com/spotware/openapi-proto-messages/main/OpenApiCommonMessages.proto && curl -o src/proto/OpenApiMessages.proto https://raw.githubusercontent.com/spotware/openapi-proto-messages/main/OpenApiMessages.proto && curl -o src/proto/OpenApiModelMessages.proto https://raw.githubusercontent.com/spotware/openapi-proto-messages/main/OpenApiModelMessages.proto
scripts.generate-types: pbjs -t static-module -w es6 -o src/generated/messages.js src/proto/*.proto && pbts -o src/generated/messages.d.ts src/generated/messages.js
